title: 649: BITCOIN BOOM TO $700K LIKELY AMID TIDAL WAVE OF BTC ADOPTION, PREDICTS PANTERA CEO - HERE’S WHEN!!!!
description:
Pantera Capital founder Dan Morehead is anticipating a $700,000 Bitcoin price on the heels of rising adoption rates. 

In an interview on Yahoo Finance Live, Morehead outlines his bullish thesis, saying that the top crypto asset could hit $700,000 once everyone with a smartphone connects to the BTC network.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
